title: Le Francais par le film. No. 03

description: Comprises twelve graduated lessons, each of which introduces a typical scene of French life and customs and stresses some part of French grammar. This episode centres around the home and the limbs and parts of the body. Grammar refers to negatives, and personal and possessive pronouns.
